author: .paulharris
content:
if anyone is about, when a chain_reorg happens (https://ethereum.github.io/eth2.0-APIs/#/Events/eventstream), the `depth` field - is so that we can calculate back to the common ancestor block? so basically `slot - depth = commonAncestorSlot` ?
i wonder if we're going to end up wishing that was just a common ancestor block root rather than a depth, so that its not able to be interpreted incorrectly if someone passes numbers that aren't quite perfect or something...
